title: Legal Executive
description:
•	Drafting, reviewing and negotiating a range of contracts, including customer facing terms, Brand partnership agreements, marketing and technology agreements, supply agreements, and intellectual property licensing agreements.
•	Providing day-to-day legal support on operational matters, including advising on issues relating to data privacy, IT security, payments and counterparty disputes.
•	Developing and documenting contracts, terms and condition
•	Serves as the liaison with regulatory agencies as required and is responsible for submitting applicable regulatory filings.
•	Working time: Mon-Fri from 8.30am - 5.30pm
requirements:
We are looking for a Legal Executive who will come up with solutions that are both legally strong and commercially practical, interest in IT-related legal issues, and a strong professional ethics. The position will involve working for our global client base.
•	Strong written and verbal communication skills including technical writing skills
•	Ability to collect, organize and classify information.
•	Good analyzing, evaluating and communicating.
•	Experience in carrying out procedures for foreign investment in Vietnam and experience in investment law
•	English is a must. Proficiency in English listening, speaking, reading and writing.
